attributes.action: Make a more meaningful effort to engage with the british public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Engage more directly with the british public than the 'token' systems of e-petitions by reading/responding to some of your personal, and e-petitions

rejection.details: If you wish to comment on e-petitions, please email "number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk"
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
